ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 95
ygData.msgSnippet: Brian- About faction...If you can do anything abou this one thing i am sure a LOT of sks would love is if we could train in all the sk guilds.  I have only
ygData.messageBody:
Brian-
About faction...If you can do anything abou this
one thing i am sure a LOT of sks would love is if we
could train in all the sk guilds. I have only been to
4 guilds(i am a dark elf) neriak, freeport, grobb, and
oggok. I can only train in neriak and freeport. i do
not understand why i cannot train in/have access to
the quests in the sk guilds in grobb and oggok. It is
very annoying. I talked to a gm once and he said
somehting like "shadowknights are a strange bunch. try
killing things in teh wild to get your faction up"
there are no such things and i am very angry that a
guide doesn't even know this.
Another thing about faction. In mistmoore you
take a faction hit with Queen Cristanos Thex or
something. You gain faction with her when you do
quests and stuff in neriak. I talked to a number of
sks and necros and they said this faction isn't really
implemented yet. I am scared that my own guild will
kill me if it ever does get implemented :( The wierd
thing is that in mistmoore everything is kos to
me...why would killing something that is kos to you
hurt your faction with your guild...it doesn't make
sense. If this faction ever gets implemented that
would mean 2 dugeons dark elf sks and necros can't
hunt in : Crushbone and Mistmoore. I think if we can't
hunt in mistmoore why not make it like a high pass for
dakr elves. I guess there would be problems with that
with camping items in dangerous places but i dunno.

just my 2 copper

Tekman Hatebringer, 27th campaign
House of Malice
Rodcet Nife Server
